Version 3.0 Updated for iOS 8 and iPhone 6 and 6 Plus!

Convert anything from the normal to the not-so-normal with the most elegant and unique unit converter in the App Store.

Convertible is not only a powerful conversion tool but is also entertaining and educational thanks to the many non-standard units of measure available.

Features:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Today Extension, view your most recent conversion (great for Currency updates) - iOS 8+ only
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Elegant interface with 18 beautiful themes.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Full range of standard units for both metric (SI) and non-metric.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Hundreds of non-standard units categorised for quick access: Geography, Nature, Everyday Objects, Sports, etc.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Compound unit conversion on many units including time (e.g. hours, minutes, seconds), length, area, etc.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fraction input and output on some units (e.g. inches)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ URL Scheme support, automate conversions with apps such as Launch Center Pro.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Adjustable decimal precision from 5 to 15 significant figures.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ A huge range of standard and non standard units from planck lengths to the size of the visible universe. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Share conversions via Twitter, Facebook, email and messaging.

Convertible helps to visualise conversions in ways not possible with other converters: compare distance in miles to the length of the Amazon River, area in square yards to the size of a football field, the possibilities are endless.
